= Moonshine_Sphinx

=== A plugin for Moonshine[http://github.com/railsmachine/moonshine]

A plugin for installing and managing sphinx.

=== Instructions

* <tt>script/plugin install git://github.com/railsmachine/moonshine_sphinx.git</tt>
* <tt>script/plugin install git://github.com/railsmachine/moonshine_god.git</tt>
* edit sphinx.god in the <tt>templates</tt> directory and save to <tt>config/god/</tt>
* Configure settings if needed
    configure(:sphinx => {:version => '0.9.9'}) # 0.9.8.1 is the default
* Include the plugin and recipe(s) in your Moonshine manifest
    plugin :sphinx
    recipe :sphinx
